1USD TAPE NETWORK
November 14* 1952
MEMO:
TO : ALL NAEB TAPE NETWORK STATIONS
FROM: NETWORK HDQ.
RE : SPECIAL BBC CHRISTMAS PROGRAMS.
Attached you will find promotion materical from the BBC describing
programs available from them for the Christmas season*
The list of programs available are:
Her First Christmas 15:00 (Christmas Edition of London Forum)
Christmas Fare 15:00 (To be on one reel with First Christmas
Each in His Own Way 30:00
Welcome Yule 28:00
The Dickens of a Christmas 28:49
IMPORTANT 2 PLEASE NOTE I Those programs are to come directly from the
NAEB Network Hdq. They will not came from the Bf£ as do the other BBC shows*
DO NOT BICYCLE THIS PROGRAMS* ^Return them directly, to NAEB Network Hdq*
Please indicate on the order form below which of the BBC programs your
station would like to receive* A station may order any or all of the programs
PLEASE RETURN THIS FORM BY NOVEMBER 28«
